photos.title: Expensive Misery at Kavatzi and Smokinya
photos.alt: If you are with your girlfriend and have a car, one night in  Smokinya camping will cost you more than 10 euros. This is the most expensive misery you can buy in the whole wide world. The toilets / bathrooms are under any kind of standards, you don't receive anything for your money...

sections.content: This photo from Kavatzi and Smokinya is titled 'Expensive Misery' and captures a view related to the Smokinya camping area. The accompanying description is highly critical, noting that a single night's stay for a couple with a car costs more than **10 euros**, labeling it as 'the most expensive misery you can buy'. It specifically points out that the **toilets and bathrooms are subpar and 'under any kind of standards,'** and that visitors feel they receive **no value for their money**. This image and description highlight potential issues with the camping amenities and value at this location. Every location on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast has unique characteristics and atmosphere. Kavatzi and Smokinya offers a specific experience with distinctive features of nature, architecture or everyday life.
